description: Number of stable feedback shift registers with n stages.
references: Author?, in Theory of graphs: International Symposium. Held at the International Computation Center in Rome, Jul, 1966. Scientific editor, P. Rosenstiehl; Gordon and Breach, New York; Dunod, Paris 1967, xviii+416 pp. See page 238.
